Summary: it was a bright beam of light
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were camping out in the middle of nowhere, no one around for miles, we were standing around the truck talkin, my dad had a camara around his chest when a flash hit my chest and face, i thought it was my dad taking a picture of me, but he denied that he did, that kid of scared me, so i leaned up against the truck looking out at the city in the distance, when i saw the light again, i looked right into the beam, it hit me and only me,it was bluish in color, at the time of the flash there was a "clicking" noise, the light was about 20-30 feet hight, but it was like 1-200 yards out so it could have been higher, it was so bright that it was like lookin into the sun for a short amount of time. for the whole weekend, i felt like i wasnt alone. it truly creeped me out. - we are located between Edwards AFB and China Lake AFB
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in California City
There were no other sightings in California City on or around February 14th 2009
